cast.original_title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
cast.overview: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.
cast.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

crew.overview: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go. Eventually, he forms an unlikely bond with one of them — a damaged, brainy troublemaker — and with the school’s head cook, who has just lost a son in Vietnam.
crew.title: The Holdovers

crew.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
crew.title: Knives Out

crew.overview: Two astronomers go on a media tour to warn humankind of a planet-killing comet hurtling toward Earth. The response from a distracted world: Meh.
crew.title: Don't Look Up

crew.original_title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
crew.overview: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.
crew.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

crew.overview: In post-Sept. 11 Los Angeles, tensions erupt when the lives of a Brentwood housewife, her district attorney husband, a Persian shopkeeper, two cops, a pair of carjackers and a Korean couple converge during a 36-hour period.
crew.title: Crash

crew.overview: Metal drummer Ruben begins to lose his hearing. When a doctor tells him his condition will worsen, he thinks his career and life is over. His girlfriend Lou checks the former addict into a rehab for the deaf hoping it will prevent a relapse and help him adapt to his new life. After being welcomed and accepted just as he is, Ruben must choose between his new normal and the life he once knew.
crew.title: Sound of Metal

crew.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
crew.title: Knives Out

details.biography: Amy Greene is a film Producer, Stunt Coordinator, and Stunt Performer, who's recent projects include the Academy Award winning The Holdovers, Academy Award winning Sound of Metal, and Academy Award nominated Knives Out. Other films she's been a part of have won awards at Sundance, Cannes, and The Independent Spirit Awards.
details.name: Amy Greene
